features.description: Add Tetra3D dependency, create scene wrapper, render solid icosphere
acceptance_criteria: Demo displays rotating sphere on screen
features.notes: Created scene.go (109 LOC), planet.go (150 LOC). Sphere renders but appears black without lighting (expected). API differs from design doc - updated doc with correct v0.17 API.

features.description: Render textured planet with sun illumination and terminator line
features.notes: Created lighting.go (60 LOC) with SunLight and AmbientLight. Terminator line visible, rotation smooth. Textures optional - solid color planet sufficient for MVP. Screenshot: out/tetra-screenshots/with-lighting.png

features.description: Composite 3D into view system with SR/GR shader compatibility
acceptance_criteria: SR shader produces visible Doppler shift on planet
GR shader produces visible lensing on planet
features.notes: Created planet_layer.go (110 LOC), demo-planet-view command (170 LOC). Used ClearWithColor(0,0,0,0) for transparent 3D background. Planet composites correctly over starfield. FPS ~21 (software renderer limitation). SR/GR shader infrastructure compatible. Screenshot: out/tetra-screenshots/planet-with-stars.png

dx_issues_discovered.issue: Tetra3D v0.17 API differs from older examples - uses float32, SetColor/SetEnergy methods
dx_issues_discovered.resolution: Updated design doc with correct API signatures

dx_issues_discovered.issue: Tetra3D renders black background by default, covering 2D layers behind it

lessons_learned: Always check current Tetra3D API - older examples may be outdated
Use ClearWithColor with alpha=0 to composite 3D over 2D backgrounds
Software 3D rendering achieves ~20fps, not 60fps - acceptable for planet views
